Docs.summary: Gets or sets the content received by the activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The content can be one of the following types: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent>. Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent> when receiving a message <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> or a message contract type. Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent> when receiving data contract types.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a reference to the activity paired with this activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activities are used together to model a request/response message exchange pattern. This property specifies which <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> activity the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activity is paired with.
